sub_title: Fashion & Apparel | Buying & Sourcing | Production Coordinator | Merchandising
summary:
I am a professional with 8 years of experience in apparel merchandising and buying, supported by an extensive education background. Throughout my career, I have gained valuable expertise in design and product development, production coordination, and buying. I specialize in overseeing the complete production cycle, from design development to delivery.

I believe my career is defined by my contributions to the industry, leveraging my expertise, attention to detail, commitment to quality, effective planning and organization, concise documentation, and ability to maintain a comprehensive situational overview.

school.name: Bachelor of Arts from Delhi University
JD institute of fashion technology, New Delhi, India

profile_positions.description:
• Handled various brands/labels such as Style & Co, INC, Karen Scott & Tasso Elba, specializing in casual wear and embellished wear for men's and women's categories.
• Managed various types of fabric qualities in woven and knits.
• Took responsibility for development and production processes with India's largest manufacturers, such as Orient Craft, Pearl Global, and Rolex.
• Analysed trends and worked closely with manufacturers for upcoming season collections.
• Oversaw the sampling process to ensure timely submission of all development samples.
• Negotiated prices and set up TNA (Time and Action) plans with manufacturers until the order was confirmed.
• Reviewed production plans on a weekly and monthly basis with manufacturers to ensure timely order
fulfilment.
• Assessed quality in coordination with the quality control manager at each stage of manufacturing, from the first sample to bulk production.
• Analyzed sales figures, customer reactions, and market trends to anticipate product needs and plan product ranges.
• Managed all kinds of fabric, garment, and trim testing, with special attention to garment dyed styles testing.
• Monitored on-time delivery and coordinated with the logistics team for shipment handover.
• Prepared monthly and quarterly reports for business plans related to order intake.
• Served as an in-house trainer for PLM (Product Lifecycle Management) software.
profile_positions.title: Apparel Merchandiser

profile_positions.description:
• Handled brands/labels such as Belk, with sub-brands including New Directions and Chip & Pepper in the women's category.
• Responsible for arranging new collections based on season and received inspiration.
• Managed complete product development and sampling according to customer requirements.
• Collaborated with customers and vendors to negotiate costs and allocate styles based on capability and cost.
• Maintained regular communication with vendors and customers to oversee merchandising activities, including fabric/trims/testing and sample submissions and approvals.
• Conducted weekly status meetings with the team to ensure all approvals were completed before the TNA (Time and Action) due date.
• Maintained communication with the QA team to ensure no quality issues and that all inspections were
conducted on time.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Merchandiser

profile_positions.description:
• Handled brands/labels such as Wal-Mart and Esprit in the ladies, kids, and men's categories.
• Developed and accomplished product requirements for seasonal launches according to buyer standards.
• Received tech-packs and analyzed fabric and trim details to ensure the best possible outcome.
• Submitted all development and meeting samples in a timely manner, aiming for the best possible price.
• Obtained approvals for lab dips, print strike-offs, and yarn-dyed desk looms.
• Ensured on-time submission of fit, pre-production, and TOP (Top of Production) samples.
• Placed timely orders for fabric, accessories, and trims to ensure smooth production.
• Monitored and obtained status updates at every stage, including cutting, stitching, finishing, and packing, from the production department to meet deadlines.
profile_positions.title: Apparel assistant Merchandiser
